channel.title: Npc kbd drop help
channel.description:
50 4087 2581 10696 11732 6585 1111 1199 1211 8101 1249 1617 1621 1619 2363 565 1515 1319 1123 1615 1247 1111 1199 1211 8101 1249 1617 1621 1619 2363 565 1515 1319 1123 1615 1247 1111 1199 1211 8101 1249 1617 1621 1619 2363 565 1515 1319 1123 1615 1247 8101
okey thats my kbd Drops i wanna add . 15415 Donator_Cape 15416 Dragon_Kite 15412 Lime_whip 15403 Lava_whip i wanna add these and make it nearly impossible to drop .. i dont get tho my stuff is all messy n its hard to add them if u cud thanks so much.

item.title: Npc kbd drop help
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Just look for npcdrops.cfg in Windows Explorer in you server files and go to the method that the npcdrop.cfg is mentioned and comment it out. It might cause errors at first, but you’ll just need to comment out/delete more methods possibly in other classes.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc kbd drop help
item.dc:creator: @cdj cdj
item.description:
@cdj wrote:

ahh ty man ur a life saver . but . im not good with conversions. i see what u mean tho it looks hella easier but the thing is . idk how to add that n take out my drop system.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc kbd drop help
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Try this, it seems to look pretty good. http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/snippets/282721-npc-drop-system.html
I would not advise doing it unless you know how to convert things to work for your server.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc kbd drop help
item.dc:creator: @cdj cdj
item.description:
@cdj wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

Add a better NPC drop base. There are some bases out there that are decent but a lot better than the standard PI version.

iknow :\ i wish i had a fresh clean drop’s with every monster i even tried to download sources but kno luck i wish i could find a npcdrop.cfg file with clean formatted with pretty much every monster *

Read full topic
